duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide supervision, leadership, and coaching to a team of remote Call Center and BPO Operations Agents.
Collaboratively support contractual requirements and SLAs by working closely with remote agents, supervisors, and operations managers.
Monitor and review team and agent performance and quality metrics to ensure program objectives are met.
Oversee day-to-day team operations, management, training support, agent staffing/scheduling, and reporting.
Conduct team meetings, performance reviews, and set individual goals for staff.
Assist in writing manuals and other needed documentation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or the equivalent 4 years leadership experience
